headline: U.S. Senate Candidate Dave McCormick Campaigns in Erie
sentences: He started Saturday morning at Crossroads Dinor in Edinboro, then made his way to the Flagship City Food Hall in the afternoon and finished the day at the RV and Sport Expo at the Bayfront Convention Center.
He also gave remarks and answered questions on what his stance is on issues that could affect Erie residents.
Dave McCormick made his first stop to Erie on Saturday for his campaign for U.S. Senate.
He visited with Erie residents to hear their concerns and what issues matter to them.
He made a series of campaign stops in the Erie area.
